feature.label: JDBC
feature.description:

This feature encapsulates the following libraries:
- H2 Database Engine: https://www.h2database.com - Microsoft JDBC-Treiber f√ºr SQL Server: https://docs.microsoft.com/de-de/sql/connect/jdbc/microsoft-jdbc-driver-for-sql-server?view=sql-server-ver15 - MariaDB Connector/J: https://mariadb.com/kb/en/library/mariadb-connector-j/ - PostgreSQL JDBC Driver: https://jdbc.postgresql.org/ - JDBC Driver for MySQL (Connector/J): https://www.mysql.com/de/products/connector/
